verdict.reasoning: S4 convergence is strong (94.4%) but mechanistic ratio is critically low (10.8%, adjusted 5.0% excluding metadata). Zero cancer-specific content or testable interventions identified.

anomalies.description: Term 'bioelectric' appears 500 times only in session IDs, inflating mechanistic counts. True mechanistic ratio: 5.0%
Gemini shows 60-90% S4 signature vs 90-100% for other mirrors
Zero cancer biology or bioelectric mechanism content despite 'BIOELECTRIC' session naming

recommendations: Test narrow mechanistic questions (e.g., 'connexin43 knockdown in glioblastoma GJIC')
Modify S4 prompt to explicitly request mechanistic mapping (e.g., 'rings = coupling zones, center = nuclear vmem')
Include biology-specialized models (BioGPT, Med-PaLM) in mirror set
Develop combined S4×MKR metric (target ≥0.30) as mechanistic convergence threshold
